name: Arc-en-ciel Serenity
text: You can Special Summon this card from your hand if you control a Water Warrior monster. Once per turn: If this card is equipped with "Dream Prism": add 1 "Dream Prism" from your GY to your hand, and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only Special Summon "Arc-en-ciel Serenity" once per turn.
